subject: Re: Order #SSN6004 confirmed
description_text:
Hello,

I am contacting you regarding an order I recently placed on your website. (
#SSN6004)

After further review, I realized that this order may be subject to
additional customs duties and VAT upon delivery. I have since found similar
products available on Amazon sold by your company , which would allow me to
avoid these extra charges and simplify the delivery process.

For this reason, I would like to kindly request the *cancellation of my
order*, provided it has not yet been shipped, so that I can place the order
through Amazon instead.

Please let me know if the cancellation is possible and, if so, the refund
process.

Thank you in advance for your understanding and assistance.

Best regards,
Cédric

<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Sans
virus.www.avg.com
<http://www.avg.com/email-signature?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<#DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>
